name: Wa Plurk Updater Plugin
author: Diwa G. Fernandez

sections.description: Posts any updates to your plurk account using the Plurk API. This plugin is inspired by the Twitter Updater plugin. Any comment and/or suggestion will be appreciated.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wa_plurk folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Tools, Plurk Updater to set your Plurk account and other choices then that’s it.
sections.faq:
Do I need a Plurk Account

Yes, you need an account for where it will be posted
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • updated a few codes that might have a problem on posting on plurk.

1.0.6

  • Added an option to removed saved plurk account from the option.

1.0.5

  • Added a notice if the plurk account is valid.

short_description: This a simple plugin that sends any updates from your site to your Plurk account.
description: Posts any updates to your plurk account using the Plurk API. This plugin is inspired by the Twitter Updater plugin. Any comment and/or suggestion will be appreciated.
